name: Snowball
description: A Snowball is a mixture of Advocaat and a carbonated lemonade in approximately equal parts. It may have other ingredients, to taste.
directions: Pour lemonade and lime juice into an ice-filled tall glass.
Add advocaat which will mostly sink through other ingredients.
lightly stir to integrate while retaining the lemonade's carbonation.
Fill up with ice and then add the rum.
